categories: Category:Wizards of the Coast Expanded Universe articles

nodes.text: "Vergere, Master of Mystery" is a web enhancement written by Cory J. Herndon and released by Wizards of the Coast on December 19, 2002 as a companion to The New Jedi Order: Traitor and The New Jedi Order: Destiny's Way. It provides a short biography and stats for Vergere.
